current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Richard B. Russell National School Lunch Act to establish a permanent, nationwide
			 summer electronic benefits transfer for children program.

sponsor.#tail: introduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to the

to reduce or eliminate the food insecurity and hunger of children; and
to improve the nutritional status of children.

The amendments made by this section shall apply to taxable years beginning after December 31, 2014.
